metadata.name: Yikes
metadata.description:
YIKES.

.
What a palava
Mindless of drama 
Karma looms on the hills 
Where there's space ships & llamas 
           Iridescent dreams in light of the means 
Lean on brittle schemes and martyrs 
Beams in fact don't stay still 
Withering trees ignite 
Flames shiver 
.
.
Staring at hindsite
                             don't
.
.
Ill advice from a mad man
One way to go is out in style
Party and fly running down like the nile
         What precious circumstance waits
In search of chase 
Make haste
.
Pace     your   self    but    don't    break    yourself 
Make    your   bed   and   lie         in            it 
.
        oh                        while                               
You were eating ice cream in vain                  
I almost put a bullet in my brain
How's that for a shame

        all            a              for                  but             evolving
Its         Just       bout          control           we're

Reality..

- Joe Nix

Copyright For All Time.

Shine x
